rmp.university: University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill
comments: Elizabeth is the best! One of my favorite professors, ever. She is really helpful, gives good lectures, and is crazy accomplished. definitely take!
She is a gift to us all
She's awesome. Passionate about the subject and cares about all of her students. Oh and she brought treats to class a few times :) If you can take a class with her I would.
probably the coolest professor you will ever have

Great class. She is very helpful and clear, and bipartisan. Some reading, but nothing hard or unbearable. The class was interesting, there was no midterm or final. I would take this class again, very sweet woman.
